data.text: @exodusenglish @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 Mine too but if your mates the Tories get their way there will be job cuts, and pension cuts to working people . We want people to think about not driving their cars, this won’t help either . This Government is smoke and mirrors.
@dagenhamwin @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 My concern is hard-pressed families struggling to get to work.

@exodusenglish @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 Do you feel your mates the Tories are doing right by workers and passengers not funding our transport properly ? Or that they saw us through covid the workers, and are forced to take industrial action .
@dagenhamwin @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 So that you support industrial action despite the huge impact on local families.

@exodusenglish @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 This is about job losses, and pension issues. If they have good pay, that’s because their trade Union got that deal . That’s what it’s all about. It’s a public service, and not investing in that the Government is wrong .
@dagenhamwin @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 Margaret  , do you really believe that underground train drivers are underpaid?
@dagenhamwin @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 I hope tomorrow Rafal you learn to spell better.

@dagenhamwin @RMTunion @unite_southeast @JonCruddas_1 I hope tomorrow  pepole  will tell this selfish  pepole what they think about them .
You are not heroes youa are disgusting  .
